description:
doc/effective_go: minor fix
        We have 'gofmt' and 'go fmt', but not 'go tool fmt'.

messages.text:
On 2012/03/04 13:37:39, minux wrote:
> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
> 
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go/

I think the proper fix might be to either remove the parenthetical or to say something more like `(also usable on packages via "go fmt")` since "go fmt" != "gofmt" but "go tool fmt" was == "gofmt".

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=61d59e66b8ff ***

doc/effective_go: minor fix
        We have 'gofmt' and 'go fmt', but not 'go tool fmt'.

R=golang-dev, kyle, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5739043

Committer: Rob Pike <r@golang.org>

On 2012/03/04 22:33:47, Kyle E. Lemons wrote:
> I think the proper fix might be to either remove the parenthetical or to say
> something more like `(also usable on packages via "go fmt")` since "go fmt" !=
> "gofmt" but "go tool fmt" was == "gofmt".
We have gofmt, but not 'go tool fmt'.
The only remaining programs in $GOROOT/bin are go, godoc and gofmt.

subject: code review 5739043: doc/effective_go: minor fix
